verses.name: Revelation 2:16
verses.text: Repent; or else I will come unto thee quickly, and will fight against them with the sword of my mouth.

verses.name: Revelation 2:17
verses.text: He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches; To him that overcometh will I give to eat of the hidden manna, and will give him a white stone, and in the stone a new name written, which no man knoweth saving he that receiveth it.
